Old Hindu solar and lunar dates

Source: R/old_hindu.R
old_hindu_solar_date.Rd

Old Hindu solar and lunar dates

Usage

old_hindu_solar_date(year, month, day)

as_old_hindu_solar(date)

old_hindu_lunar_date(year, month, leap_month, day)

as_old_hindu_lunar(date)

Arguments

year

A numeric vector of years

month

A numeric vector of months

day

A numeric vector of days

date

A date vector on some calendar

leap_month

A logical vector indicating if year is a leap year

Examples

gregorian_date(2025, 1, 1:31) |>
  as_old_hindu_solar()
#> <old_hindu_solar[31]>
#>  [1] 5125-Dhan-18 5125-Dhan-19 5125-Dhan-20 5125-Dhan-21 5125-Dhan-22
#>  [6] 5125-Dhan-23 5125-Dhan-24 5125-Dhan-25 5125-Dhan-26 5125-Dhan-27
#> [11] 5125-Dhan-28 5125-Dhan-29 5125-Dhan-30 5125-Dhan-31 5125-Maka-01
#> [16] 5125-Maka-02 5125-Maka-03 5125-Maka-04 5125-Maka-05 5125-Maka-06
#> [21] 5125-Maka-07 5125-Maka-08 5125-Maka-09 5125-Maka-10 5125-Maka-11
#> [26] 5125-Maka-12 5125-Maka-13 5125-Maka-14 5125-Maka-15 5125-Maka-16
#> [31] 5125-Maka-17
